body: Multimedia Presentations                         Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site Highlights This video provides a brief introduction to Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site.   Duration:3 minutes, 23 seconds                                The People Mandan/Hidatsa flute player and storyteller Keith Bear uses music and story to bring to life the culture of the Upper Missouri.   Duration:5 minutes, 5 seconds                                Native Prairie Restoration Learn about the ongoing process of Native Prairie Restoration at the park.  Duration:7 minutes, 38 seconds
title: Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site: Multimedia Presentations
